scripts.schedule:daily: npm run build && env-cmd node build/schedules/daily.js
scripts.schedule:weekly: npm run build && env-cmd node build/schedules/weekly.js
scripts.schedule:test: npm run build && env-cmd node build/schedules/test.js
scripts.dev:heroku: npm run clean:build && npm run postinstall & env-cmd heroku local web
scripts.dev: npm run clean:build && npm run postinstall & env-cmd node build/index.js
scripts.load-test: artillery run --output report.json load-test.yml && npm run load-test:report
scripts.load-to-db: npm run build:data && env-cmd node data/build/data/load-to-db.js
scripts.load-to-db-raw: npm run build:data && env-cmd node data/build/data/load-to-db-raw.js
scripts.prepare-training: npm run build:data && env-cmd node data/build/data/prepare-training.js
scripts.prepare-validation: npm run build:data && env-cmd node data/build/data/prepare-validation.js
scripts.ft-validation: npm run build:data && env-cmd node data/build/data/ft-validation.js
scripts.test: npm run build:data && env-cmd node data/build/data/test.js
scripts.run-test: npm run build:data && env-cmd node data/build/data/run-test.js
scripts.base-from-db: npm run build:data && env-cmd node data/build/data/base-from-db.js
scripts.delete-files: npm run build:data && env-cmd node data/build/data/delete-files.js
scripts.generate-report: npm run build:data && env-cmd node data/build/data/generate-report.js
scripts.translate: npm run build:data && env-cmd node data/build/data/translate.js
scripts.unit: npm run build:data && env-cmd node data/build/data/unit.js
